column3: Built NEW, bench tested okay, all sensors working.  RF modem, Iridium, and GPS tested okay. Loaded firmware v1.11, 110408.
Ran current drain test with v1.11, 110408, problem with RF modem not turning off and powering down.
Updated firmware to version 1.11, 111101.
Updated firmare to version 1.11, 111121.
Started test for IO2-12, put in LOG mode with all MET sensors except LWR & Baro.  All subsurface sensors except no SBE39TPs (which are at Seabird getting calibrated).
Stopped system, took out of LOG mode.  Battery voltages not working, reading high, 20v with 10v input.
Pat tried to troubleshoot voltage problem on CPU board, A/D CH 6, but could not fix it, so replaced CPU board.  New CPU board working, battery voltage telemetry is now working.
Started test for IO2-12, put in LOG mode with all MET sensors except LWR & Baro, plus 4 inductive sensors: TC, T, Nortek, TP. Located outside of Bldg 3 in tube test rack.
Successfully sent Rudics dialout command XO to turn-on the RF modem
IO-12 TEST COMPLETE, disconnected power from TFLEX0004 electronics (accidentally, instead of cntrl-C out of LOG mode)
NOT used on IO3-12-BJ, air shipped back to Seattle.
Updated firmware to version 1.11, 120504
Started testing outside for PI3-12, spare system.  Reconfigured with new cal file with LWR & Baro.
Ended testing for PI3-12
Shipped for PI3-12-RB, Spare system.
Spare system from PI3-12-RB, not deployed.  Will be shipped back after cruise.
Spare system back at PMEL from PI3-12-RB, not deployed.
Updated firmware to version 1.12, 130225.
Started testing outside for PI3-13 (to replace TFLEX0007 with data Flash RAM write problem).
Accidently knocked over TFLEX0004 electronics can while painting the Nortek heads, which disconnected & reconnected power, resetting LOG mode.
Stopped TEST for PI3-13.
Deployed at 8S-67E, RT004, on IO3-13-SK
Mooring ADRIFT, RECOVERED?
Recovered RT004, IO4-15-SN, at 7 38.10S 60 11.27E. ATRH broken, Anemometer damaged on recovery. All instruments recovered, all nylon lost. Release Lost.
Back from India, TFLEX0004 physically undamaged.  Mooring vandalized and set adrift.  Needs checkout.
Verified U1 & U2 on MET board TI ICs, removed solder bridge JP24 on CPU board, updated Rain Ground from Seawater to Power ground.
Installed firmware v1.12, 150313 to do current drain test.
Found corrosion on connector board pins, so replaced connector board.
Ran current drain test for 3 days, 17.26mA Ave.  See intermittent spurious command characters in always 1 of 6 Aquadopp IM data lines in the Iridium buffer:  examples >/sa  >/sam

Replaced GND faceplate connector (adding pin1&2, before only pin2).  Installed NEW IMM and NEW Serial board in an attempt to fix the read command characters (>/sa & >/sam) intermittantly corrupting one velocity aquadopp data string (in a 6 hour data buffer).
Ran a new current drain test and Aquadopp data test (with new IMM & Serial bd).  Ran for 4 Days, 14.03mA average.
Upgraded to v2.01, 170530 Firmware
Back from Indonesia, IO1-18, not deployed, but tested on deck.  System left in LOG mode and shipped back in LOG mode.
Installed metal SS standoffs on bottom of circuit board stack (Higley).
Ran benchtop current drain test for 3.5 days, 13.43mA Average.  Flash RAM data dump looked good.
Successfully tested XMIT and GPS commands outside on internal antennas.
